text:
wyDay | Senior Software Engineer | Junior Software Engineer | REMOTE | NH / MA, U.S.A.

We build premium development and licensing tools for software companies.

Our small engineering team is remote with a home base in New Hampshire & Massachusetts. C++/C#/PHP/mySQL stack.

Email us if you'd like to learn more or submit a resume: employment@wyday.com

We're hiring both a senior software engineer and a junior software engineer.

More info here: https://wyday.com/careers/developer/
